Title: Increases the monetary penalties for the failure to provide appropriate shelter for a dog left outdoors
Summary: Relates to penalties for the failure to provide appropriate shelter to a dog left outdoors.
LawCode: Amd ยง353-b, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to increasing the monetary penalties for the failure to provide appropriate shelter for a dog left outdoors
